import React,{Suspense}from'react';import"./BooksComponents.css";import{Card,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{fetchOneBook}from"../../api/fetchingApi";import{TakeDataBookComponent}from"./TakeDataBookComponent";import Loader from"../loader/Loader";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BookItem=function BookItem(_ref){var book=_ref.book,navigate=_ref.navigate,booksStore=_ref.booksStore;//fetch one book by id and move to BookPage
